title: On Learning Chess as an Adult – From 650 to 1750 in Two Years
excerpt: I caught the chess bug as a college student, twenty-one years old, and it's become my favorite way to unwind since then, as I'm now working at VisioStack and starting a master's in CS at Clemson University. Like all hobbies, chess is more fun when you're making progress. And progress as an adult is certainly…
